last_episode_to_air.name: Mr. Banks Goes to Washington (w/ Michelle Obama)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Special guest First Lady Michelle Obama joins Thomas Morton as they explore the issues facing veterans today.

name: Balls Deep
overview: Intrepid host Thomas Morton hangs out with different groups of people and gives their lives a try. It's sort of like a foreign-exchange program, but for subcultures instead of countries. And there's only one student in it.

episodes.name: Tent Preachin'
episodes.overview: Intrepid host Thomas Morton hangs out with different groups of people and gives their lives a try. It's sort of like a foreign-exchange program, but for subcultures instead of countries. And there's only one student in it.

episodes.name: Tugs
episodes.overview: Thomas tries not to lose his fingers working as a deckhand on a NYC tugboat.

episodes.name: Ramadan
episodes.overview: Thomas joins a Muslim family in Michigan to fast for the holy month of Ramadan.

episodes.name: Bears
episodes.overview: Bear Week is where all the heaviest, hairiest homos come to celebrate their heft.

episodes.name: Alaska Natives
episodes.overview: Thomas learns how to live off some of the least live-off-able land on Earth.

episodes.name: Orgasmic Meditators
episodes.overview: Thomas joins an enclave of new age seekers in So Cal in an effort to put his finger on the pulse of femininity.

episodes.name: Last Week of High School
episodes.overview: The senior class of two Gary, Indiana high schools get ready to graduate. SENIORS!

episodes.name: Seniors
episodes.overview: The retirees of Hallandale, Florida's Lake Point Tower keep their golden years nice and busy. SENIORS!

episodes.name: Trump Campaigners
episodes.overview: Thomas meets Ralph Case, Trump's top volunteer in southern Ohio, and the band of Trump supporters he's mustered to get out the Trump vote.

episodes.name: Ranchers
episodes.overview: Sheep and Cattleman Hank Voegler protects his flocks from the Nevada desert's two greatest predators: Coyotes and the Federal Government.

episodes.name: T-Girls
episodes.overview: Two transwomen from the Bronx navigate the difficulties, rushes, and drag balls of transitioning in 2016, with the support of their newly assembled gay families.

episodes.name: Frosh
episodes.overview: The freshperson class of 2020 matriculates at Beloit College in Wisconsin, while the upperclassmen return for the first week of school.

episodes.name: Dead
episodes.overview: Thomas attends an autopsy performed by a private Forensic Pathologist in Phoenix to find out what happens to your body when you bite the big one (death).

episodes.name: Valley Goths
episodes.overview: Thomas descends into the goth scene of suburban LA to see what's changed since he left it, many lugubrious teenage moons ago.

episodes.name: Zen & the Art of Living
episodes.overview: Thomas follows Zen Buddhist Tracey Ryan as he floats through the moneyed world of the New York art scene and builds a human rhizome of creativity, entrepreneurial largesse, and fun.

episodes.name: Mr. Banks Goes to Washington (w/ Michelle Obama)
episodes.overview: Special guest First Lady Michelle Obama joins Thomas Morton as they explore the issues facing veterans today.
